metadata.title: USN-7157-3 -- PHP vulnerabilities
metadata.description: USN-7157-1 fixed vulnerabilities in PHP versions 7.4, 8.1, and 8.3. This update provides the corresponding updates for PHP version 7.0.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain inputs when  processed with convert.quoted-printable decode filters.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive  information or cause a crash. (CVE-2024-11233)    It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain HTTP requests.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to performing arbitrary  HTTP requests originating from the server, thus potentially  gaining access to resources not normally available to the external  user. (CVE-2024-11234)    It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain inputs.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or  execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2024-8932)    It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain MySQL requests.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause the client to  disclose the content of its heap containing data from other SQL requests  and possible other data belonging to different users of the same server.  (CVE-2024-8929)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7157-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-bcmath - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-bz2 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-cgi - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-cli - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-common - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-curl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-dba - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-dev - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-enchant - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-fpm - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-gd - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-gmp - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-imap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-interbase - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-intl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-json - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-ldap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-mbstring - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-mcrypt - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-mysql - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-odbc - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-opcache - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-pgsql - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-phpdbg - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-pspell - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-readline - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-recode - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-snmp - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-soap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-sqlite3 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-sybase - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-tidy - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-xml - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-xmlrpc - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-xsl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 php7.0-zip - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm14 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
